info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 9:45AM CDT until July 20 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bond County in south central Illinois... Northeastern Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Southeastern Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... Southwestern Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 944 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Clare, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Highland, Staunton, Gillespie, Mount Olive, Bunker Hill, Benld, Worden, Livingston, Alhambra, Wilsonville, Sorento, Sawyerville, Mount Clare, East Gillespie, Eagarville, Reno, Prairietown, Panama, Grantfork, and New Douglas. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 33 and 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
